name: D3vil Spammer UserBot
description: D3vil Smapper UserBot made by @D3_krish join for query in telegram @D3VIL_SUPPORT

API_KEY.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org! Putting other value may  result.In account ban

PLUGIN_CHANNEL_ID.description: put here plugin channel username ex:- @abcd

HEROKU_MEMEZ.description: If the UserBot is running on a Heroku Dyno, this value should be True.

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: Heroku API Key, 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account', scroll down and press Reveal API.Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top.Required for updater to work.

UPSTREAM_REPO_URL.description: In case you provide fork, add your repo URL here. By default, our repo address is attached.

COUNTRY.description: Set your country to be used in the .time and .date commands. Turkey is set by default.

TZ_NUMBER.description: Change this value if your country has more than one Time Zone.

TZ.description: If you have no idea what this is for, don't poke it:)

CHROME_DRIVER.description: Selenium tabanlı modüller için ChromeDriver konumu.

GOOGLE_CHROME_BIN.description: For Carbon.py. Leave as it is.

BOT_USERNAME.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at @BotFather and get the username of your bot.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Needed for inline buttons maker. Make a bot at [BotFather](http://telegram.dog/BotFather) and get the token of your bot. And Don't Forget To Turn on inline Mode on bot settings. Get it.

GENIUS.description: Type the Genius API Token you received here.

AUTO_PP.description: It is the variable required for the Autopp module to run. You have to enter the direct address of the picture you will use for it to work.

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: It is the variable required for the Autopp module to run. You have to enter the direct address of the picture you will use for it to work.

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: Set this to True if you need details in the console log.

PM_AUTO_BAN.description: PM Auto Ban Feature. 'Hey! This is a bot.' module.

PM_AUTO_BAN_LIMIT.description: PM Auto Ban limit. It will be blocked if the user sends x messages to you.

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: .The YouTube Data API for the .yt command is key. Get it from https://console.cloud.google.com.

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: OCR API Key for the ocr Get. https://ocr.space/ocrapi adresinden alın.

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: API Key for the rbg command. Get it from. https://www.remove.bg/api adresinden alın.

ANTI_SPAMBOT.description: After joining, he kicks spambots from groups. [Requires administrator privileges to kick]

ANTI_SPAMBOT_SHOUT.description: Report spambots to admins after joining the group if you don't have administrator privileges to kick.

TMP_DOWNLOAD_DIRECTORY.description: Download location for many modules (GDrive, .download etc ..)

CLEAN_WELCOME.description: When a new person joins, the old welcome message is deleted.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Enter the client id for Google Drive.

LASTFM_API.description: SECRET Key for the Last.FM module. [Get one here - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create]

LASTFM_SECRET.description: SECRET Key for the Last.FM module. [Get one here - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create]

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Enter the client secret for Google Drive.

G_DRIVE_AUTH_TOKEN_DATA.description: Enter Google Drive authentication data as JSON structure.

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: This module needs the CoffeeHouse API to work. 'https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.info/dashboard' You can get it here.

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Set the default city for the weather module of UserBot.

LOGSPAMMER.description: Set this value to True if you want error logs to be stored in the UserBot log group instead of sending the file in the current chat. Requires a valid BOTLOG_CHATID value to be set.

WARN_LIMIT.description: The number of warnings required to gimme / ban the person Usually 3 is used.

WARN_MODE.description: The event that will occur after 3 warnings. You can just type gmute or gban. Otherwise, the bot may not work.

GALERI_SURE.description: It is for the gallery plugin. How many seconds should the profile photos change?

PAKET_ISMI.description: Set the edit command package name. The name of the package will be: @ UserName the value you give is 1

OTOMATIK_KATILMA.description: If you do not want to join the Support group and Channel automatically, type False..
